mapper.select: SELECT DECD_SN , APVL_RQST_SQ , DECD_SQ , DECD_STTS_DCD , DECD_STTS_NM , DCFC_ENO , DCFC_ENM , DECD_DTM , DCFC_ANNO_CNTN , RJCT_YN , RJCT_RSN_CNTN FROM ( SELECT A.DECD_SN , A.APVL_RQST_SQ , A.DECD_SQ , A.DECD_STTS_DCD , (SELECT Z.CD_VL_NM FROM IBIMS001B A RIGHT JOIN IBIMS002B Z ON A.CMNS_CD_GRP = Z.CMNS_CD_GRP WHERE A.CMNS_CD_GRP = 'D006' AND Z.CD_VL_ID = A.DECD_STTS_DCD) AS DECD_STTS_NM , A.DCFC_ENO , (SELECT EMP_NM FROM IBIMS003B WHERE EMPNO = A.DCFC_ENO) AS DCFC_ENM , TO_CHAR(A.DECD_DTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS DECD_DTM , A.DCFC_ANNO_CNTN , A.RJCT_YN , A.RJCT_RSN_CNTN FROM IBIMS232B A WHERE A.DECD_SN = #{decdSn} AND A.APVL_RQST_SQ = #{apvlRqstSq} ) T
